title: Exorcist Wa Midara Ni Aragau
alternative_title: エクソシストは不浄に抗う ; The Exorcist Who Fights Against The Impure
status: エクソシストは不浄に抗う ; The Exorcist Who Fights Against The Impure
description:
Description :
        In a world where evil spirits and Yōkai have become a societal problem, there are "Exorcists" who struggle day and night to exterminate these creatures for world peace. In this world, a 15 year old boy named Mashiro is the leader of a certain exorcist unit. This unit is full of beauties but... They always lose and need to be rescued by him. Will Mashiro be able to make these girls into full fledged Exorcists!?
